Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Netflix has a couple of searches:

   - http://api.netflix.com/catalog/titles - search movies
   - http://api.netflix.com/catalog/people - search for people

Each returns a list of relevant material with links to movies or people.
 Once you change your application state to view people or movies, you can
see other related movies, people and other fun stuff through URLs, but you
can't get back to search.

What suggestions would you have to model the relationships between
movies/people and search?

-Solomon

--001636832072b2e7ba046d4132f2
